H0.text: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease is an inherited muscle wasting disease affecting which part of the body. The Hands

H1.text: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease is an inherited muscle wasting disease affecting which part of the body. The Feet

H2.text: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease is an inherited muscle wasting disease affecting which part of the body. The Arms

H3.text: Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease is an inherited muscle wasting disease affecting which part of the body. The Legs

A6.text: Patients can also have high arched feet, hammer toes, foot drop, foot deformities, and scoliosis.

A7.text: Symptoms of these disorders include: ... lack of feeling, lack of reflexes, and lack of sight and hearing, which result from muscle atrophy.
